comments:
Build 20020321

- I had a PDE Manifest editor open (on the Dependencies page).
- I went to the Workbench->Preferences page andchanged the PDE option "Show 
plug-in objects in editors and dialogs using:" from "Presentation names" 
to "Identifiers".
- A dialog displaying the error below appeared.
- The failure is repeatable

Note: one of the required plug-ins for this project is missing

I made one dummy (missing) dependency and tried to reproduce this but cannot. I 
am using build 0328, and that may be the reason.

Note that the line where NPE happens is where PDE calls 'event.getProperty()' 
using the event object passed to the property change listener. Maybe a null 
event was fired in some cases and if the UI team fixed this problem, that would 
explain the lack of NPE I am experiencing.

Please verify with 0328. If you cannot reproduce the problem, I will close the 
bug.
This problem seems to be fixed (probably in the Platform UI code). Closing.
